about.title: About Me
about.paragraph1: I'm a passionate automation professional and 'Practical Software Engineer' with extensive experience in developing automation frameworks and leading technical teams. Currently serving as Head of Automation in Private Digital & Team Lead at Bank Leumi, I specialize in creating practical, scalable solutions that drive efficiency and quality.
about.paragraph2: My approach combines hands-on engineering with strategic leadership, focusing on building robust automation infrastructures that empower teams to deliver exceptional results. I'm constantly exploring new technologies and methodologies, including AI Agents, Cursor AI, and AWS Bedrock, to stay at the forefront of the automation field.
about.paragraph3: Beyond my professional roles, I'm an avid learner and technology enthusiast. I'm a self-proclaimed 'Udemy addict' who continuously expands my knowledge, and I enjoy coding as a hobby, always experimenting with new tools and frameworks. I'm also a gadget enthusiast who loves staying on top of the latest tech innovations.
